briefdescription.para: Knots of the spline.
Polynomials of the spline.
Current trajectory.
True if the output is valid.
Current time of the advance interface.
True if the coefficients are computed.
Initial conditions of the spline.
Final conditions of the spline.
Time step of the advance interface.
Destructor.
Set the time step of the advance interface.

simplesect.para: if the the time step is not set, the user cannot use the advance features.

parameterdescription.para: the time step of the advance block.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Set the knots of the spline.

parameterdescription.para: vector containing the time instant of the knots.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Set the initial condition of the spline.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Set the final condition of the spline.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (Eigen::Ref< const T > initialVelocity, Eigen::Ref< const T > initialAcceleration)
memberdef.name: setInitialConditions

briefdescription.para: Set the initial condition of the spline.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (Eigen::Ref< const T > finalVelocity, Eigen::Ref< const T > finalAcceleration)
memberdef.name: setFinalConditions

briefdescription.para: Set the final condition of the spline.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::chrono::nanoseconds &t, Eigen::Ref< T > position, Eigen::Ref< T > velocity, Eigen::Ref< T > acceleration)
memberdef.name: evaluatePoint

briefdescription.para: Evaluate the spline at a given point.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< std::chrono::nanoseconds > &t, std::vector< T > &position, std::vector< T > &velocity, std::vector< T > &acceleration)
memberdef.name: evaluateOrderedPoints

briefdescription.para: Evaluate the spline at given set of points.

parameterdescription.para: ordered vector containing the time instant

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.
The time vector has to be ordered. No check is performed.

briefdescription.para: Evaluate the spline at a given point.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if the output is valid.

simplesect.para: True if the output is valid, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Get the output of the system.

simplesect.para: The output of the system.

briefdescription.para: Advance the system.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.
The user has to set the time step of the advance interface.

briefdescription.para: Compute the duration of each phase (sub-trajectory).

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Compute the intermediate quantities of the spline.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Set the coefficients of the polynomial.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Compute the coefficients of the spline.

detaileddescription.para:
If the coefficients are already computed the function is a no-op.
This function calls computeIntermediateQuantities and updatePolynomialCoefficients.
True in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Set the boundary conditions related to the velocity and acceleration.

simplesect.para: True in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Spline implement a basic spline.

simplesect.para: The spline is defined as a set of polynomials. The coefficients of the polynomials are computed using the boundary conditions. The boundary conditions are the initial and final velocity and acceleration.

parameterdescription.para: type of the spline. T must be an Eigen type (i.e. Eigen::Vector3d).
